protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the removal of O-acetyl ester groups from position 9 of the parent sialic acid, N-acetylneuraminic acid.

reference.reference_text: Zhu H, Chan HC, Zhou Z, Li J, Zhu H, Yin L, Xu M, Cheng L, Sha J: A Gene Encoding Sialic-Acid-Specific 9-O-Acetylesterase Found in Human Adult Testis. J Biomed Biotechnol. 2004;2004(3):130-136.
